name: Six Bullets
description:
A wizard, in a vast desert, with, only six bullets left.

Start the run, and get a random amount of bullets, but only up to six. Use them wisely, shoot enemies, explode them with barrels, or lure them onto spikes, or dash through the level to keep as much ammo as possible. Find the blue potion before the untouchable ghosts get you, and you win the game.

==================

I didn't get any chance to work on this game yesterday, and because of time zone restrictions, I have to submit this six hours before the deadline, but I'm happy with what I've made for the amount of time. I suppose that's the point of a game jam, though...

Anyway, here's the details of the game mechanics:

Player: Has three hitpoints, deals one hitpoint, dashes with shift.

Slimes: Have two hitpoints,  deal one hitpoint.

Cyclops: Have three hitpoints, deal one hitpoint as area damage.

Ghost: Doesn't take damage or collide with walls, deals one hitpoint.

Gravestone: Summons one ghost per minute.

Spike: Deals one hitpoint, can damage the player

Barrel: Deals two hitpoints, explodes, can explode other barrels, and certain walls

With all of that out of the way, enjoy the game!
